title: A confusing condensed + Imagine
content:
Hi,

2 ID requests here....

Would really apreciate some help with this one....I first thought it was Empire or some version of it but the N is a mismatch...In the undisguised one...

The other "Imagine" is just plain curiosity

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140726001755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/undisguised_5097.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140726001755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/imagine2_3671.jpg)
author: dana321

comments.content: The closest I can get for the more condensed face is [Obelysk](http://web.archive.org/web/20140726001755/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=LST0000304#characters), but the contrast is not as high.
Bureau Empire is close to the first font too.
